website_summaries.verdict: You’ll get the hang of controlling this rolling MiniDrone before you know it, and from there, it’s all about pushing the high-jumping and durable device to the limit with cool aerobatics, spins, and tricks.
cons: A rolling drone is a completely different animal than a flying drone, but it’s a great training drone

customer_reviews.title: they are ok
customer_reviews.text: One is broke out of the box the wheel spins 2 0r 3 times then stops. one of them is good took forever to get connected but once you figure it out its ok. They do disconnect every so often which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Spend more time reconnecting these things to WiFi. Constantly dropping the WiFi signal. When they work they are fun, but sadly your always trying to get them reconnected.

customer_reviews.title: It is fun toy but very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of box, needed to update drone software which was not straightforward. It is fun toy but very noisy.

customer_reviews.title: The controller app disconnects every 10 seconds

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We were skeptical about this purchase and the whole jumping thing, my 8 year old really likes it and it redly surpassed our expectations. It’s a fun little toy.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids (and myself) really enjoy playing with it. Fun for all ages.

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: A super cool product, but it won't hold a charge for longer than about 4 minutes. I've contacted customer support so will hopefully get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Lynn Brophy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my seven year old and he loves it! Easy to set up and use and he likes using his tablet as a remote and likes to make it jump.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids! Fast shipping. New. Great outdoors. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: The first one I bought is still working and my son and I love it, but I wanted two of them but ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 mini night jumping drones and had to return 3 of them because of various problem (jumping mechanism malfunctions, wheels not turning, loss of connection after jumps). The first one I bought is still working and my son and I love it, but I wanted two of them but I have given up on that dream.
customer_reviews.author: night panther

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The product it's great! My kid loves it. I goes pretty fast and the jumping feature is cool. It doesn't run over grass too well, so no rough terrain play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrivial
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these as a bundle from Woot (an Amazon subsidiary), one of them disconnects every few minutes so it is unplayable, another has its battery dead on arrivial. Can't say we are lucky spending just 39.99 for them, these are completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: App no longer updated.
customer_reviews.text: This drone is app controlled but the app is not longer updated. Driving screen icons are all blank or default to the headphone icon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hilliard

If your toy is making noises and hate it like monster noises while your driving it look at the top left corner of the scren where you can see through you drone camera using it you can turn off the volume and other thing let me know if this was help? I Recommend This Toy 10 out of 10 Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: charles

product_meta.title: Parrot Jumping Night MiniDrone - Marshall (Red)
product_meta.description:
Meet the Jumping Night MiniDrone from Parrot! Agile and lightweight, it leaps and dashes through the dark with an embedded VGA (480X640) mini camera that sends photos and videos directly to your smartphone or tablet. Program sound and light choreography to create a show for your friends and family. Download the Freeflight 3 app to live stream your video experience on your smartphone or tablet’s piloting screen. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


Feel the need for speed Go on fast moving, around-the-clock adventures with your second-generation Parrot Jumping Night MiniDrone. Fast, energetic and ultra-stable, this MiniDrone rolls, zig zags and leaps up to 2.5 feet in the area. Flip on the two powerful LED lights to explore obscure corners and to create memorable light shows. 

Spin, jump, rock and roll Your MiniDrone offers three modes to help you customize your adventure. In Jumper Mode, it leaps up to 2.5 feet and still lands wheels first. In Kicker Mode, your MiniDrone uses springs to push objects out of its path. In Auto-Balance Mode, your MiniDrone remains perfectly balanced on both wheels.


Get down with your best moves Program a sequence of acrobatic moves, sounds and lights using the Road Plan feature. Once you’ve got everything in place, your sequence saves to the FreeFlight app for later use.


Stay steady as you go In Open Wheel Mode, your wheels remain extended so you can drive as fast as you want without compromising stability. In Retracted Wheel Mode, bring your wheels in to enhance your agility as you maneuver through narrow areas.


Take control of your ride Piloting your MiniDrone is simple with FreeFlight 3. Download the free app to your smartphone or tablet and get instant access to in-flight tricks and maneuvers. Take photos during your ride and view them later with friends and family. *FreeFlight 3 is available in the App Store or in the Google Play Store.



Tips for getting started Before driving, be sure to update your Jumping Night's software and fully charge its battery. For double the ride time and twice the fun, pick up an extra battery with your purchase. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at 877-9Parrot (877-972-7768) or at www.parrot.com/support
feature_bullets: Agile and lightweight Jumping Night MiniDrone with embedded VGA (480X640) mini camera; sends photos and videos directly to your smartphone or tablet; microphone and speaker capture and broadcast audio
Equipped with two LED lights for exploring in the dark; create light and sound effects and save them to 4GB internal memory
Leaps up to 2.5 feet (80 cm) in the air and always lands on its wheels; jump disables when MiniDrone is picked up
Free Flight Jumping app gives you ultimate control from your smartphone or tablet
Removable, Lithium-Polymer 550mAh battery lasts up to 20 minutes and recharges in 25 minutes (with 2.6A charger, not included)
